field.label: Peer-IP
field.help: Specify the IP address of the OSPF neighbor.

field.label: Poll-Interval
field.help: The poll-interval specifies the rate for sending hello packets to neighbors that are not active. When the configured neighbor is discovered, hello packets will be sent at the rate of the hello-interval. The default poll-interval is 60 seconds.

field.label: Priority
field.help: The priority is used to for the Designated Router (DR) election on non-broadcast multi-access networks.
